recipesJson.name: addy's Quick Custard
recipesJson.author: Freshepies
recipesJson.description:
A shake and vape version of the very first e-liquid I ever tried and still one of the best I've ever had.

Shake and vape, but perfect after 3-5 days.

reviews.text: So we know your quick custard is amazing, but this with the added NY Cheesecake and fruit combo is heaven in a vape. ðŸ’œ. Absolutely, delicious. Thank you for sharing and all the fabulous work you do for the community. ðŸ’œ
Love this version even more than the original.  Thanks for sharing with us. You and Addy Tuney are the best!
I love this stuff....thanks for sharing!
The fruit mix in this recipe is so refreshing.  I usually shy away from custards during the summer, but this one is a great summer vape.  Thanks for sharing the recipe.
